title: Worgfang
content:
Worgfang Uncommon 1~4 Damage 1d4 Piercing Goblin's Undoing: Goblins have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against the wielder. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: 'No goblin will strike you down' is etched into this dagger's handle. When goblin assailants realised they couldn't kill the dagger's original owner, they gave him to the worgs, who made short work of him. Dagger Light Finesse Thrown 0.45 260

Goblin's Undoing: Goblins have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against the wielder.

Proficie
